title: If you're not picking Jhin, Kaisa or Xayah you might as well play a different role
body: I don't think I've ever seen ADC's balance this bad before, playing anything else in to these champs is basically a nightmare

replies.body: {{champion:119}} {{champion:81}}  are high Pick aswell and {{champion:67}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:429}}  see quite some even proplay aswell
Xayah is literally one of the worse adcs
I almost always see {{champion:236}} {{champion:81}} {{champion:67}} in my games. If there is a Kaisa in my game, I'm the one playing her lol

I mean, is Xayah even strong rn? And I'm pretty sure Ezreal, Vayne, and Lucian are all stronger than the champions you've listed. Compared to when marksmen items were reworked, I think adc's are doing mediocre right now. Perhaps not as strong as season 7, but still doing quite well.
